dict.acceptation: 关系，联系；亲戚（关系）；说话，叙述，报告；比率，比数；

sent.trans: 试比较relation、 relations、 relationship这叁个词。

sent.orig: Relationship has the widest use, covering many of the meanings of relation and relations.
sent.trans: relationship用法最广，包括了relation和relations的许多含义。

sent.orig: Subject has multiple relations with object, such as understanding relation, value relation, and aesthetic relation.
sent.trans: 主体与客体具有多重关系。有认识关系，有价值关系，还有审美关系。

sent.orig: The teacher-student relation is a particular social relation and interpersonal relation in the teaching activities.
sent.trans: 师生关系是教师和学生在教与学活动中形成的特殊社会关系和人际关系。

sent.orig: The interpersonal relation can be simply classified as affective feature relation and tool feature relation.
sent.trans: 人际关系可以简单地分为情感性关系和工具性关系。
